element.hint: The business analyst is inherently a stakeholder in all business analysis activities. The BABOKÂ® Guide presumes that the business analyst is responsible and accountable for the execution of these activities.
element.label: Business Analyst

element.hint: A customer uses or may use products or services produced by the enterprise and may have contractual or moral rights that the enterprise is obliged to meet.
element.label: Customer

element.hint: Provides the expertise within the business to provide input and feedback when evaluating solution alternatives, particularly for the potential benefits of a solution.
element.label: Domain Subject Matter Expert

element.hint: End users are stakeholders who directly interact with the solution. End users can include all participants in a business process, or who use the product or solution.
element.label: End User

element.hint: Use their expertise in terms of the design options being considered to provide needed input about the constraints of a solution and its costs.
element.label: Implementation Subject Matter Expert

element.hint: Can help evaluate the difficulty and costs of integrating proposed solutions with existing processes and systems.
element.label: Operational Support

element.hint: Plans and manages the solution definition process, including the solution scope and any risks associated with the proposed solutions.
element.label: Project Manager

element.hint: Regulators are responsible for the definition and enforcement of standards.
element.label: Regulator

element.hint: Sponsors are responsible for initiating the effort to define a business need and develop a solution that meets that need.
element.label: Sponsor

element.hint: Provides information on the functionality associated with a particular design option.
element.label: Supplier

element.hint: Testers are responsible for determining how to verify that the solution meets the requirements defined by the business analyst, as well as conducting the verification process.
element.label: Tester
